response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us and is estimated to be worth $1,200,000 to you. Considering its unique features and benefits, I would like to offer you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with exceptional value while ensuring a profitable transaction for us. We believe this price reflects the product's quality and aligns closely with its perceived worth to you. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of conducting business together.", "product_price": 950000}
